Trustee_10_pre_2.name: Mohammed Al-Farsi
Trustee_10_pre_2.content: During the investment process, I consistently exhibited transparency and integrity, effectively managing the investment and ensuring that profit distribution was in accordance with the agreed plan. My actions reinforce my reputation as a reliable and fair trustee dedicated to the best interests of my investors.

Investor_10_pre_3.name: Mohammed Al-Farsi
Investor_10_pre_3.content: I have been a trustworthy investor, demonstrating responsible governance and integrity throughout the investment process. I adhered to the agreed plan and engaged positively with the trustee, reinforcing my reputation as a conscientious investor.
